about_the_game:
Terraria: Otherworld may not have made it to completion, but that won’t stop you from enjoying its epic soundtrack!

Featuring 26 epic songs intended for Terraria: Otherworld - composed & produced by Jeff Broadbent & Jonathan van den Wijngaarden, with a special Credits track by award-winning composer James Hannigan - the Terraria: Otherworld Official Soundtrack makes a great addition to any Terrarian’s collection and will give you a glimpse into what might have been.

FULL CREDITS



Composer: Jeff Broadbent - Jonathan van den Wijngaarden - James Hannigan
Cello: Tina Guo (Sky Biome)
Violin: Jeff Ball (Underground Theme)
Guitar: Frank Klepacki (Darkness tracks)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 185 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 815 MB available space
